name: Max Barskih
description: '''Mykola Mykolaiovych Bortnyk''' ({{langx|uk|Микола Миколайович Бортник}}, born 8 March 1990), better known by his stage name '''Max Barskih''' ({{langx|uk|Макс Барських|links=no}}) and alter-ego '''Mickolai''', is a Ukrainian singer and songwriter. He was raised in [[Kherson]], Ukraine, and moved to [[Kyiv]] after his graduation. He has released six studio albums, one compilation album and one [[Extended play|extended-play]].
